features.name: Enforce GitHub issue creation for all harness features
features.description: Enforce mandatory GitHub issue creation in the /do command workflow. The command should ALWAYS create a GitHub issue before any feature/fix work begins, include full reasoning/acceptance criteria in the issue body, and block progression until issue is created.

custom: Manual test: Run /do 'test feature' and verify issue is created before any code work
Check that issue body contains full context (description, rationale, acceptance criteria)
